content.rendered:

You are here: Home

  • Siblings

    • Overview

  • Services and support
    • Overview
    • Parent support groups
    • Parent mentoring programs
    • Useful links
  • Participate in research
    • Overview
    • Information for researchers
    • Research participation – D/deaf children with complex communication needs
  • Standards and guidelines
  • Advocating for your child
  • Financial matters
    • Overview

    • Financial assistance for families with a child with disability
    • Assisted travel schemes
  • Perspectives of deafness

    • Deaf culture
    • Re-imagining stories: What if Estella or Jane Eyre had been deaf?
  • Family stories

Communication

Explore information and tips about communication.

Education

Hints and tips you might find useful at school and in the classroom.

Entertainment

How to make entertainment more enjoyable and accessible to your child.

Family

Check out our practical and family-oriented tips.

Financial

There is financial support available for some families of children who have a hearing loss.

Hearing devices

Ideas and tips for everyday issues with hearing devices.

Knowledge and skills

Build your knowledge and skills to support your child.

Medical

Tips for when you and your child are attending medical or therapy appointments and even surgery.

Music

How your kids can enjoy and learn music.

Safety

These tips on safety are a must read!

Sport and activities

Playing sport, coaching, sun protection and humidity tips.

Wellbeing

Wellbeing for your child and family.
